active-flow-timeout.help: Timeout to report active flows (1 - 60 min, default = 30).
active-flow-timeout.name: active-flow-timeout

inactive-flow-timeout.help: Timeout for periodic report of finished flows (10 - 600 sec, default = 15).
inactive-flow-timeout.name: inactive-flow-timeout

source-ip.help: Source IP address for communication with the NetFlow agent.
source-ip.name: source-ip

template-tx-counter.help: Counter of flowset records before resending a template flowset record.
template-tx-counter.name: template-tx-counter

template-tx-timeout.help: Timeout for periodic template flowset transmission (1 - 1440 min, default = 30).
template-tx-timeout.name: template-tx-timeout
